text: Interesting.  People (who’d used Julia and then had to use Go) told me that direct use of Go from other languages was very hard / nigh impossible - interesting to see that the other direction does work.

text: thats interesting that the other direction is so difficult. Depending on the situation I would consider ZMQ or a similar technology, but that's got a cost too it. It's weird because Go has pointers, you'd think you could just point out - but it's also a GC lang. so GC fighting GC is trouble in the making. Handling it in julia is pretty easy with an IDDict
